title: Native Smart App Banner
body: Both iOS (https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/AppleApplications/Reference/SafariWebContent/PromotingAppswithAppBanners/PromotingAppswithAppBanners.html) and Android (https://developers.google.com/web/updates/2015/03/increasing-engagement-with-app-install-banners-in-chrome-for-android) have a native smart app banner in some form. I get a lot of questions of customers if we can implement this on their websites and at this point we need to resort to javascript solutions. These solutions are producing a lot of false positives (my Lumia 950XL is being considered an Android device), need constant maintenance to keep up with new and updated browsers and inject html into my page.
